messages.content:
[INST]Perform a code change review on the following pull request changes. Provide a synthesis of the changes and the approach taken. Determine if test cases are needed and present. Lastly, estimate the level of complexity of the change from 1 to 5. Code changes are provided in Git patch format: 'eba7dc4 -David Montoya - add go workspace (17 hours ago)'
diff --git a/.gitignore b/.gitignore
index a1a8693..5b377b4 100644
--- a/.gitignore
+++ b/.gitignore
@@ -11,9 +11,6 @@
 # Output of the go coverage tool
 *.out
 
-# Go workspace file
-go.work
-
 # Build directory
 build/
 
diff --git a/go.work b/go.work
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..cf5bd4f
--- /dev/null
+++ b/go.work
@@ -0,0 +1,7 @@
+go 1.24.5
+
+use ./
+
+use ./examples/bert-sentiment-analysis-with-cpr
+
+use ./examples/llama-sentiment-analysis[/INST]
